main_definition: Ken refers to the range or extent of one's knowledge, awareness, understanding or perception about a particular subject.

meanings_and_examples.definition: General level of knowledge about something
meanings_and_examples.example: His ken on ancient history is quite extensive.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Awareness or perception of things in a particular area
meanings_and_examples.example: She has limited ken when it comes to technology.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Ability to grasp the essence of something quickly
meanings_and_examples.example: He had an instant ken for the novel's intricate plot.
